page.title: GalaxyTrader MK3
page.t: When enabled, pilots gain experience from trading and require training at certain levels.
Automatically sends pilots for training when they reach required levels.
Adjusts how fast pilots gain experience.
Minimum profit margin required for trades to be cached.
Controls how many notifications are shown: 0=Quiet, 1=Important only, 2=All
Automatically sends ships for repairs. Only for pilots level 12+. S/M → Equipment Dock, L/XL → Shipyard.
Hull percentage for auto-repair trigger. Default: 95%.
Minimum pilot level for auto-repair. Default: 12.
